ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix 1.12.0 Release Candidate
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Gordon, consider the last part of my post void - seems like for some reason I ve been testing with a broken WARC file. But still I m unable to use the v10

consider the last part of my post void - seems like for some re=
ason
I've been testing with a broken WARC file. But still I'm unable to use=

the v10 WARCReader...

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
